mapper.sql: select id, brand_id, category_id, create_time, update_by, update_time, del_flag, del_flag, remark from category_brand
mapper.select:
SELECT cb.*, c.name as categoryName, b.name as brandName,b.logo FROM category_brand cb left join category c on cb.category_id = c.id and c.del_flag = '0' left join brand b on cb.brand_id = b.id and b.del_flag = '0'
and cb.brand_id = #{brandId} and cb.category_id = #{categoryId} and cb.del_flag = '0'
order by id desc
select b.id, b.name, b.logo from category_brand cb left join brand b on b.id = cb.brand_id and b.del_flag = 0 where cb.del_flag = 0 and cb.category_id=#{categoryId} order by b.id desc
